articles.title: 2022 MLB All-Star Game recap: American League wins at Dodger Stadium - USA TODAY
articles.description: The American League won the All-Star Game for the ninth year in a row.
articles.content:
The American League won the All-Star Game for the ninth year in a row, beating the NL 3-2 on Tuesday night at Dodger Stadium in Los Angeles.

articles.title: Aurora shows after solar storm hits Earth amid fear of global outages - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The most intense geomagnetic storm ever recorded resulted in the 1859 Carrington Event when telegraph lines electrified, destroying operators and setting offices ablaze in North America and Europe.
articles.content: Space enthusiasts were able to capture the shots of stunnig aurora after a solar storm struck Earth today amid fear of global outages impacting radio and GPS. Aurora is a natural light seen predomina… [+1464 chars]

articles.author: Loren Grush
articles.title: Most Americans think NASA's $10 billion space telescope is a good investment, poll finds - The Verge
articles.description: A new YouGov poll found that 70 percent of Americans have favorable opinions of NASA, and most think that the agency’s nearly $10 billion James Webb Space Telescope was a good investment.
articles.content:
And the people want more space pictures
